name: Of Mice and Merriment
description:
Of Mice and Merriment

A 3D collectathon made for the 2022 Winter N64 Style Graphics Jam! Made in collaboration with Blue Lava, MEHDI and Sid Chou. Collect all the lost decorations scattered throughout the world and help everyone decorate their trees to perfection!

Controls Action Button Menu buttons, shoot decorationLeft-click Switch decorationRight-clickMove
WASDLook aroundMove mouseZoom in/outScroll WheelEnter aim mode
Left ShiftJumpSpaceTurn tree (while decorating)A and D Credits

Blue Lava [Soundcloud] - Music, world concept, character design

Gabe M Carvalho [Itch, Github] - Programming, 3D modeling

MEHDI [Github] - Programming, character models

Sid Chou [Itch, ArtStation] - Textures

P.S., The desktop build is recommended
